name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra features a stunning 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with 120Hz refresh rate. Powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor with 12GB RAM and 256GB storage. Quad camera system with 200MP main sensor, 12MP ultra-wide, 10MP telephoto with 3x optical zoom, and 10MP periscope with 10x optical zoom. 5G enabled with all-day 5000mAh battery and 45W super fast charging. Includes S Pen stylus. IP68 water and dust resistance.

name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max with titanium design and A17 Pro chip. Features 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology up to 120Hz. Triple camera system with 48MP main camera, 12MP ultra-wide, and 12MP telephoto with 5x optical zoom. USB-C port with USB 3 speeds. Action button for quick access to features. All-day battery life with up to 29 hours video playback. Available in Natural Titanium, Blue Titanium, White Titanium, and Black Titanium.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise cancellation with Sony's HD Noise Cancelling Processor QN1. Premium sound quality with 40mm drivers and LDAC codec support. Up to 30 hours battery life with quick charging (3 min charge = 3 hours playback). Multipoint connection lets you switch between devices seamlessly. Speak-to-chat automatically pauses music when you start talking. Lightweight design with soft cushions for all-day comfort.

name: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Gen)
description: Apple AirPods Pro with Active Noise Cancellation and Adaptive Transparency. Custom high-excursion driver and amplifier for rich bass. H2 chip delivers improved audio performance. Up to 6 hours listening time with ANC on, 30 hours total with MagSafe charging case. Personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking. Four sizes of silicone tips for customizable fit. Sweat and water resistant (IPX4).

name: Apple iPad Pro 12.9-inch (M2)
description: The ultimate iPad experience with the powerful M2 chip. Stunning 12.9-inch Liquid Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology and True Tone. 12MP Wide camera and 10MP Ultra Wide camera with Center Stage. Works with Apple Pencil (2nd generation) and Magic Keyboard. All-day battery life with up to 10 hours of use. Available with Wi-Fi 6E and optional 5G. Face ID for secure authentication.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9
description: Premium Android tablet with 11-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and 120Hz refresh rate. Powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor with 8GB RAM. Includes S Pen in the box for note-taking and drawing. IP68 water and dust resistant - the most durable Galaxy Tab ever. All-day 8,400mAh battery with 45W super fast charging. DeX mode transforms it into a desktop experience.

name: MacBook Pro 14-inch (M3 Pro)
description: Supercharged for professionals with M3 Pro chip. Stunning 14.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display with 3024x1964 resolution. Up to 18 hours battery life. Advanced camera and audio system with studio-quality mics. Three Thunderbolt 4 ports, HDMI port, SDXC card slot, and MagSafe 3 charging. Space Black or Silver aluminum finish. Backlit Magic Keyboard with Touch ID.

name: Dell XPS 15
description: Premium Windows laptop with stunning 15.6-inch InfinityEdge display. Powered by 13th Gen Intel Core i7 processor with NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4050 graphics. 16GB DDR5 RAM and 512GB NVMe SSD. 86WHr battery provides extended runtime. Precision touchpad and backlit keyboard. CNC-machined aluminum chassis. Thunderbolt 4 ports for fast connectivity.

name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 11
description: Ultra-lightweight business laptop weighing just 2.48 lbs. 14-inch WUXGA display with low blue light technology. 13th Gen Intel Core processors with Intel vPro platform. Military-grade durability (MIL-STD-810H tested). Up to 57WHr battery. Legendary ThinkPad keyboard with TrackPoint. Enhanced security features including fingerprint reader and webcam privacy shutter.

name: LG 27-inch 4K UHD Monitor
description: Professional 27-inch 4K UHD (3840x2160) IPS display with HDR10 support. 99% sRGB color gamut for accurate color reproduction. USB-C connectivity with 60W power delivery. AMD FreeSync technology for smooth gaming. Flicker Safe and Reader Mode reduce eye strain. VESA mount compatible. Adjustable stand with height, tilt, and pivot.

name: Samsung 34-inch Ultrawide Curved Monitor
description: Immersive 34-inch ultrawide curved monitor with 21:9 aspect ratio and WQHD resolution (3440x1440). 1000R curvature matches the human eye for maximum immersion. 100Hz refresh rate with AMD FreeSync Premium for smooth gameplay. Picture-by-Picture and Picture-in-Picture modes for multitasking. Eye Saver Mode and Flicker Free technology.

name: Logitech MX Master 3S Mouse
description: Premium wireless mouse with ultra-quiet clicks and 8K DPI sensor for precise tracking on any surface. MagSpeed electromagnetic scrolling allows you to scroll 1000 lines per second. Customizable buttons with Logi Options+ software. Multi-device connectivity supports up to 3 devices with easy switching. Rechargeable battery lasts up to 70 days. Ergonomic design reduces hand strain.

name: Keychron K8 Pro Mechanical Keyboard
description: Wireless mechanical keyboard with hot-swappable switches and QMK/VIA support. Compact 80% tenkeyless layout saves desk space. Gasket-mounted design provides superior typing experience. RGB backlighting with per-key customization. Works with Windows, Mac, and Linux. Up to 240 hours battery life. Includes Keychron K Pro mechanical switches (Red, Blue, or Brown).

name: Anker PowerCore 20000mAh Power Bank
description: High-capacity 20000mAh portable charger with PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technology for optimized charging. Dual USB ports allow charging two devices simultaneously. Charges iPhone 13 about 4 times, Galaxy S21 about 3.5 times. MultiProtect safety system provides surge protection, short circuit prevention, and temperature control. Compact design fits easily in bags.

name: Samsung T7 Portable SSD 1TB
description: Ultra-fast portable SSD with read speeds up to 1050 MB/s and write speeds up to 1000 MB/s. Compact and lightweight design with shock-resistant solid aluminum unibody. USB 3.2 Gen 2 interface with backward compatibility. Password protection and AES 256-bit hardware encryption. Compatible with Windows, Mac, Android devices, and gaming consoles.

name: WD My Book 8TB External Hard Drive
description: Massive 8TB desktop external hard drive for backup and storage. USB 3.0 connectivity with transfer rates up to 5 Gbps. Includes WD Backup software and WD Discovery software for easy setup. Password protection and hardware encryption keep files secure. Compatible with USB 2.0 and USB 3.0 ports. Formatted for Windows, reformatting required for Mac.

name: Logitech C920 HD Pro Webcam
description: Full HD 1080p webcam at 30fps for professional video calls. Dual stereo microphones capture natural sound. Autofocus and light correction adjust to lighting conditions. 78-degree field of view is perfect for solo calls or small groups. Works with popular video calling platforms including Zoom, Microsoft Teams, and Skype. Universal clip fits laptops, monitors, and tripods.

name: Blue Yeti USB Microphone
description: Professional USB microphone for streaming, podcasting, and recording. Three-capsule array with four pickup patterns (cardioid, bidirectional, omnidirectional, stereo). Zero-latency headphone monitoring with volume control. Adjustable desktop stand with built-in shock mount. Studio-quality sound with 20Hz-20kHz frequency response. Plug-and-play with Windows and Mac.

name: Razer DeathAdder V3 Gaming Mouse
description: Lightweight ergonomic gaming mouse weighing only 59g. Focus Pro 30K optical sensor with 30,000 DPI and 750 IPS tracking. Razer Optical Mouse Switches Gen-3 rated for 90 million clicks. Up to 90 hours battery life. HyperSpeed Wireless technology provides lag-free performance. Customizable with Razer Synapse software. Includes USB-C charging cable.

name: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless Gaming Headset
description: Premium wireless gaming headset with dual-battery system for unlimited gameplay. Active Noise Cancellation blocks out distractions. High Fidelity Drivers with 360° Spatial Audio. ClearCast Gen 2 mic with AI-powered noise cancellation. GameDAC Gen 2 audio system with OLED display. Compatible with PC, PlayStation, and Xbox. Comfortable AirWeave memory foam cushions.
